MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the EH21 and EH22 postcode area of Musselburgh and Dalkeith. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 12:40pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because our engineers need to carry out further line patrols and our team are now working to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 6.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:10pm on 15th November 2020.
